data.actual_result: The categories are not centered, see attachment
data.expected_result: The categories at the bottom of the screen should be centered
data.short_description: In Horizontal View, on a 19:9 (e.g. OnePlus 6) device, the emoji categories will not be centered in search [19:9 ratio or similar]
data.steps_to_repro: - go to a chat and open the emoji picker - click on the search button to make the picker fullscreen - tilt your device to horizontal mode and observe
